thread.section_title: Prince de Galles Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of Prince de Galles Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Heshie S
title: Great Hotel
text: I have traveled through Europe and the Prince de Galles Hotel is simply OUTSTANDING! They do not miss a beat from doorman, bellman front desk staff, concierge (at this hotel these people know what it means to give you the best advise possible and will get you into almost anything!) house keeping room service spa you name it, it's done.
